testcase.classname: To test messaging functionality of LinkdIn
testcase.name: to validate sending message by searching a person
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the messaging page.........................................passed When User will search a person on the searchbar.............................passed And write a "<text>" in the textbox.........................................passed And click on the send button................................................passed Then message will be sent to respective person..............................passed
